summary: A group of scientists have developed the Resonator, a machine which allows whoever is within range to see beyond normal perceptible reality. But when the experiment succeeds, they are immediately attacked by terrible life forms.
cast: Jeffrey Combs|Barbara Crampton|Ted Sorel|Ken Foree|Carolyn Purdy-Gordon|Bunny Summers|Bruce McGuire|Del Russel|Dale Wyatt|Karen Christenfeld|Andy Miller|John Leamer|Regina Bleesz|Albert Band
keywords: body horror|molestation|based on short story|time bomb|female frontal nudity
title: Re-Sonator (From Beyond)
